text: Hey all, does anyone know if it's possible to style single checkbox properties and multi checkbox properties differently within a form module?

Are you looking to style the choice and boolean fields in the editor interface, or style how checkbox elements appear when a form is embedded on a page?

I can tell you off top that the former isn’t possible — you’re not offered a ton of control over the editor interface.

As far as the latter goes, it’s actually pretty easy! Single checkbox form fields have a wrapper with the class `hs_single_checkbox`, and multi-checkbox form fields have a wrapper with the class `hs_multiple_checkboxes`. You can target those using CSS and style away. :~) Pretty much every type of form element has one of these wrappers, which makes styling HS forms more convenient than it might otherwise be.

I hope I’ve understood correctly, and that you find this helpful!
